page.title: 14GRAND SUMMER FAIR
page.content: A{Grand Summer Fair}was held at{Green {Dragon School}on 22nd June. It was set up by the Parent-Teacher Association and was sponsored by Agfa-Gevaert (a local firm). We tried most things. The adults liked the{Tombola}and{White Elephant}stalls best. We had mixed feelings about the {Inflatable Green Dragon}- too dear, older boys pushing younger ones off - and it was slippery from the rain so our clothes got dirty, but it was a lot of fun. The{Fancy Dress}was good, but the judges seemed to be a little confused. Mickey Mouse won. No police horses or dogs - a car came instead. No{Face Painting}- we had looked forward to that! Over 500 people came and the school made over Â£800. The money will be used on visits for the children and to buy an extra computer. {The Fair was great fun.
